title: 01. Slides Studio Plugin
content: Slides Studio is an open source plugin that enables slide presentations created in Obsidian to control Open Broadcast Studio (OBS). The plugin extends the features of the Slides Extended plugin. Getting started ğŸ”§ System Configuration ğŸ”Œ Connect Obsidian to OBS ğŸ·ï¸ Add Slide Control tags ğŸ¬ Play a slides presentation

title: 01.01 Getting Started
content:
System Setup
Download the required applications and plugins

Open Broadcast Studio Free and Open Source software for video recording and live streaming.
Obsidian Free tool for organizing notes.

Slides Extended a plugin to create Reveal js slides in Markdown syntax
Slides Studio

Installation
Use the installers for OBS and Obsidian.
Slides Extended is installed through the Obsidian Community plugin store.

Open Obsidian and go toÂ Settings.
Click onÂ Community Plugins.
Make sure "Safe Mode" is turned off.
Click onÂ Browse.
Search forÂ Slides Extended.
ClickÂ InstallÂ on theÂ Slides ExtendedÂ plugin.
After installation, make sure to enable the plugin by toggling it on in theÂ Installed PluginsÂ section.

Slides Studio plugin has not been submitted to the Obsidian Community plugins yet.
To manually install the plugin

Download the latest release fromÂ .
In Obsidian, open your vault's root folder in your file explorer.
Navigate to theÂ .obsidian/pluginsÂ directory. If it doesn't exist, create it.

this folder is hidden in macOS, press 'command + shift + . ' to see it.

Extract the contents of the downloadedÂ .zipÂ file into a new folder within theÂ pluginsÂ directory.
Copy the fileÂ manifest.json andÂ main.jsinto the folderÂ slides-studio.
Restart Obsidian or reload your vault.
Go toÂ SettingsÂ >Â Community PluginsÂ and make sure "Safe Mode" is turned off.
Click onÂ BrowseÂ underÂ Community Plugins, findÂ Obsidian Slides Studio, and enable it.

title: 01. Slides Studio
content: Slides Studio is a github page that enables slides.com presentations to control Open Broadcast Studio (OBS). Getting Started

title: 01.01 Getting Started
content: Requirements A Slides.com presentation link. example, https://slides.com/uuoocl/deck-48ea10 Optionally, create a Slides.com account (starting at $5 usd per month) to create your own presentations. Download Open Broadcast Studio Free and Open Source software for video recording and live streaming. OBS Configuration: Import the Slide Studio Scene Collection Download the Slides Studio OBS Scene Collection download link. In OBS Import the Slides Studio OBS collection a. On the file menu click, "Scene Collection" -> "Import" Select the Scene Collection. a. "Scene Collection" -> "Slides.com_Collection" Enable the OBS WebSocket Server On the file menu click, "Tools" -> "WebSocket Server Settings" Check the "Enable WebSocket server" option Click the "Show Connect Info" button to view the Server Password. next: 01.02 Slide Studio Settings

title: Welcome
content: Projects Slides Studio - An Obsidian plug in to choreograph OBS scene changes and Slides Extended presentations.
